source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_00<tab>Seww would have you remove a dangerous threat to the peace of the spawning grounds.
target: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のセェウは、冒険者に倒してほしい者がいるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_01<tab>According to Seww, a notorious Serpent Reaver captain by the name of Aermswys the Stained has been plotting alongside the leaders of the Coral Tridents. The young Sahagin fears that to stand idle while they set their nefarious plans in motion would be to invite disaster for his people. Participate in the FATE “Watch Your Tongue” in the Serpent's Tongue, and present proof of your deed to Seww.
target: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_01<tab>セェウから、「海蛇の舌」の有力な船長を討伐するよう依頼を受けた。サプサ産卵地で発生するF.A.T.E.『海蛇の船長「刻印のエルムスイス」』に参加し、貢献することで得られる「<var 28 ((Item)) F21E7D01 /var>」を入手しよう。入手した<var 28 ((Item)) F21E7D01 /var>はノォヴの育成地の「セェウ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_02<tab>You have vanquished the dreadful captain and delivered her coral necklace to Seww. Novv's spawnling confirms the authenticity of the trinket, and praises the enormity of your deed. But though you have foiled whatever schemes the Coral Tridents were hatching, it will not prevent them from enlisting the vile services of the next captain who arises from the ranks of the Serpent Reavers...
target: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEQ_02<tab>セェウに<var 28 ((Item)) F21E7D01 /var>を渡した。セェウは冒険者の活躍を、大いに賞賛した。有力者を退けたことで、不穏な動きをしていた「海蛇の舌」も出鼻を挫かれただろう。再び不穏な動きを見せた際には、全力で叩きのめそう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the coral necklace obtained in the FATE “Watch Your Tongue” to Seww.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_TODO_00F.A.T.E.「海蛇の船長 刻印のエルムスイス」に参加して入手した
をセェウに渡す

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_000<tab>Pshhh... A notorioushhh Shhherpent Reaver captain by the name of Aermswys the Shhhtained has been shhheen meeting with the leaders of the Coral Tridentshhh.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_000フスィーッ……「海蛇の舌」の有力な船長である、
「」の動きが、どうもおかしい。

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_001<tab>We do not know what foul plans they are hatching, but naught that finleshhh brute is involved with bodes well for the peace of the shhhpawning grounds.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_001……おそらく、「珊瑚の銛」のリーダー「紅珊瑚の海魔」から、
何かの命令でも受けたんだろう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_002<tab>I do not think it wise to shhhtand back and allow eventshhh to unfold. If the death of one loathshhhome pirate can shhhpare my people future tragedy, then shhho be it!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_002フスィーッ……このまま奴を放置しておけば、
よからぬ企みが実行に移されるはず……。
出鼻をくじくために「」と戦ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_003<tab>Pshhh... The captain often shhhuts hershhhelf away in her quarters, but you might catch her walking about in the Shhherpent's Tongue. Shhhlay thishhh dangerous woman, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and bring me the coral necklace that shhhignifies her loyalty to the Coral Tridentshhh.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_003フスィーッ……奴を叩きのめし、
戦いの証として「」をもってくるのだ。
そいつは「紅珊瑚の海魔」に認められた証らしいからな！

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_010<tab>Aermswys the Shhhtained is one of the Tridents' moshhht vile petshhh. Bring me her coral necklace that we might know this dreadful shhhorewalker is no more!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_010「」は「海蛇の舌」の有力な船長だ。
奴と戦った証拠である「」を奪ってこい！

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_011<tab>Yeshhh, thishhh trinket is proof that the pirate you defeated was indeed the captain and none other. The Reavers will have little time for villainy while they conteshhht the matter of her succession.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_011フスィーッ……これはまさしく「」！
同じヒレナシでも、奴とお前では大違いだな。
親父が頼みとしているのもわかるぜ！

source: TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_012<tab>Pshhh... I do not undershhhtand why the Tridentshhh associate with shhhuch shhhcum. It shhheems our clutchfather has far better tashhhte in choosing his shhhorewalker allies!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH310_01409_SEWW_000_012「海蛇の舌」も有力者が襲われて、大弱りのはずだ。
まったくいい気味だぜ、フスィーッ！
